Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 55th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Pedro Lazpita (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Tanner Campbell (CHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/21/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2015, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2015, hitting .464 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
10/5/2015: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $20,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2015...
Had 7 hits with 6 RBI against Houston on 6/19/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2017, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 7/27/2017 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 9/19/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2017, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
8/14/2018: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $20,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2019, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2019...
Injured on 6/19/2021 with a Broken Hand, out for 9 weeks...
Traded from Brooklyn to Chicago on 6/25/2021 (Going to BRO: SS Earl Yi, RF Pablo Cabanillas, P Jose Granados. Going to CHI: P Michael Garrard, LF Stephen Gullion)...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 6/30/2021 (Going to NY: LF Stephen Gullion, RF Michael Bitner. Going to CHI: P Jeffrey Horne, 2B John James, 3B Fausto Ocerin)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/16/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 4/16/2022...
